meanings.sent1: The project followed a polyphasic approach, progressing through various stages smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The polyphasic nature of the moon's cycle includes waxing and waning phases.
meanings.sent3: The polyphasic play had the audience moving through different scenes like a whirlwind.
meanings.sent4: Her polyphasic personality revealed itself in layers, each phase more intriguing than the last.
meanings.sent5: The polyphasic journey of life is filled with twists and turns, each stage unique and important.

meanings.definition: Occurring at multiple times throughout the day
meanings.sent1: His polyphasic routine involved short naps at various points during the day.
meanings.sent2: The polyphasic schedule allowed for productivity both in the morning and evening.
meanings.sent3: The polyphasic eating habits of the squirrel kept it busy all day long.
meanings.sent4: The polyphasic nature of the city was evident in its bustling activity at all hours.
meanings.sent5: Living a polyphasic lifestyle means being active and alert at different times of the day.

meanings.definition: Involving multiple different types or forms
meanings.sent1: The polyphasic art exhibition showcased a variety of styles and mediums.
meanings.sent2: Her polyphasic interests ranged from music to painting to sports.
meanings.sent3: The polyphasic garden bloomed with flowers of all shapes and colors.
meanings.sent4: The polyphasic menu offered a diverse selection of dishes from around the world.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the polyphasic world of insects revealed a multitude of species and behaviors.
